mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(product_id) FROM product WHERE product_state = 'sale' AND product_categoryCode LIKE CONCAT(#{product_categoryCode}, '%')

SELECT product_id ,product_name ,product_price ,SUBSTR(product_categoryCode, 1, 6) AS product_categoryCode ,productFile_id ,productFile_name FROM product LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM productFile GROUP BY product_id) AS productFile USING (product_id) WHERE product_state = 'sale'
AND product_categoryCode LIKE CONCAT(#{product_categoryCode}, '%')
GROUP BY product_id
ORDER BY ${sort}, product_id DESC LIMIT #{perPage} OFFSET #{startRow}

SELECT CASE LEFT(product_categoryCode, 3) WHEN '001' THEN '커피제품' WHEN '002' THEN '캡슐머신' WHEN '003' THEN '일리 악세서리' END AS name ,LEFT(product_categoryCode, 3) AS code ,COUNT(product_categoryCode) AS count FROM product WHERE product_categoryCode LIKE CONCAT(LEFT(#{product_categoryCode}, 3), '%') AND product_state = 'sale'

SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(product_categoryCode, '-', -1) AS name ,SUBSTRING_INDEX(product_categoryCode, '-', 1) AS code ,COUNT(product_categoryCode) AS count FROM product WHERE product_state = 'sale'
AND product_categoryCode LIKE CONCAT(LEFT(#{product_categoryCode}, 3), '%')
GROUP BY product_categoryCode ORDER BY product_categoryCode
